title: Slippery Gypsiez
body:
Aspiring team founder/owner here,

I want to start a ranked 5 team that is able to play at high elo's and eventually make it into the pro scene (it's a long shot I know). There's a lot of things that need doing and it's only an idea at this stage, but this is much like an expression of interest to see how many people out there that are high elo are willing to participate. I won't be wanting to play, I want to be something like a manager/coach or something, I dunno but I want my team up in lights on the stage. Anyone who is keen on trying out, add me. My ign is Couus Couus

Thanks.
